languages.text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.
languages.original_text: Непрочный союз пиратских фракций Простора Коронус. Они не трепещут перед святынями, не боятся властей и готовы бросить вызов даже самым могущественным Вольным Торговцам и другим слугам Императора. Ризза Калвария, которая говорит от лица братства, охотно примет у вас любой сомнительный груз. Говорят, ее любимое место на Футфоле — "Стойкость мученика".

traits.locale_text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

languages.text: Una alianza informal de grupos piratas de la Extensión de Koronus. No consideran nada sagrado ni temen a autoridad alguna. Están dispuestos a desafiar incluso a Comerciantes Independientes y a los sirvientes del Emperador. Su portavoz, Ryzza Calvaria, aceptará toda clase de cargamento, por ilícito que sea. Su rumorea que anida en la Resistencia del Mártir de Paso.
languages.original_text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

traits.locale_text: Una alianza informal de grupos piratas de la Extensión de Koronus. No consideran nada sagrado ni temen a autoridad alguna. Están dispuestos a desafiar incluso a Comerciantes Independientes y a los sirvientes del Emperador. Su portavoz, Ryzza Calvaria, aceptará toda clase de cargamento, por ilícito que sea. Su rumorea que anida en el Adeptus Amasecus de Paso.

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスの海賊一派と緩やかな同盟関係にある。信じる宗教はなく、権威は恐れず、影響力の強い自由開拓者や皇帝の従者にも逆らう覚悟だ。スポークスマンとして働くライザ・カルバリアは、こちらから不快極まりない貨物さえ、二つ返事で受け取ってくれる。フットフォールの殉教者の忍耐こそが彼女のお気に入りの場所だと噂されている。
languages.original_text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスの海賊一派と緩やかな同盟関係にある。信じる宗教はなく、権威は恐れず、影響力の強い自由開拓者や皇帝の従者にも逆らう覚悟だ。スポークスマンとして働くライザ・カルバリアは、こちらから不快極まりない貨物さえ、二つ返事で受け取ってくれる。フットフォールの殉教者の忍耐こそが彼女のお気に入りの場所だと噂されている。

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区组织松散的海盗联盟。他们从不信奉任何神圣之物，也不惧怕任何权威，甚至随时打算反抗势不可挡的行商浪人与帝皇的众多仆从。他们的代言人莱萨·卡瓦利亚什么都愿意买，哪怕是最劣质的货物，她也愿意收购。据说，她最喜欢呆的地方是落脚港的殉道之魂号。
languages.original_text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

Ризза Калвария, которая говорит от лица братства, охотно примет у вас любой сомнительный груз. Говорят, ее любимое место на Футфоле — "Адептус Амасекус".

Непрочный союз пиратских фракций Простора Коронус. Они не трепещут перед святынями, не боятся властей и готовы бросить вызов даже самым могущественным Вольным Торговцам и другим слугам Императора. Ризза Калвария, которая говорит от лица братства, охотно примет у вас любой сомнительный груз. Говорят, ее любимое место на Футфоле — "Адептус Амасекус".

languages.text: Ein loser Zusammenschluss von Piratenfraktionen aus der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Ihnen ist nichts heilig und sie fürchten keine Autorität. Sie sind bereit, sogar den mächtigsten Freihändlern und den Dienern des Imperators zu trotzen. Ihr Sprecher, Ryzza Calvaria, wird dir selbst die widerwärtigste Fracht abnehmen. Gerüchten zufolge ist die Ausdauer des Märtyrers auf Footfall ihr bevorzugter Schlupfwinkel.
languages.original_text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

traits.locale_text: Ein loser Zusammenschluss von Piratenfraktionen aus der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Ihnen ist nichts heilig und sie fürchten keine Autorität. Sie sind bereit, sogar den mächtigsten Freihändlern und den Dienern des Imperators zu trotzen. Ihr Sprecher, Ryzza Calvaria, wird dir selbst die widerwärtigste Fracht abnehmen. Gerüchten zufolge ist das Adeptus Amasecus auf Footfall ihr bevorzugter Schlupfwinkel.

languages.text: Alliance libre de factions de pirates des Étendues de Koronus pour qui rien n'est sacré. Ne craignant aucune autorité, ils sont prêts à défier le plus puissant des libres-marchands ainsi que les serviteurs de l'Empereur. Leur porte-parole, Ryzza Calvaria, acceptera volontiers de vous débarrasser des cargaisons les plus douteuses. Selon la rumeur, l'Endurance du Martyr de Castel serait son repaire.
languages.original_text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.

traits.locale_text: Alliance libre de factions de pirates des Étendues de Koronus pour qui rien n'est sacré. Ne craignant aucune autorité, ils sont prêts à défier le plus puissant des Libres-Marchands ainsi que les serviteurs de l'Empereur. Leur porte-parole, Ryzza Calvaria, acceptera volontiers de vous débarrasser des cargaisons les plus douteuses. Selon la rumeur, l'Adeptus Amasecus de Castel serait son repaire.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği'nden korsan çetelerinin, aralarında sıkı bağlar bulunmayan ittifakı. Hiçbir şeyi kutsal saymazlar ve hiçbir otoriteden korkmazlar. En kudretli Hür Tacirlere ve İmparator hizmetkârlarına bile kafa tutmaya hazırdırlar. Sözcüleri Ryzza Calvaria, seni en şaibeli kargoların bile yükünden seve seve kurtarır. En sevdiği uğrak yerinin Binliman'daki Şehit Sabrı olduğu söylenir.
languages.original_text: A loose alliance of pirate factions from the Koronus Expanse. They hold nothing sacred and fear no authority, ready to defy even the mightiest of Rogue Traders and the Emperor's servants. Their spokesperson, Ryzza Calvaria, will readily take even the most unsavoury cargo off your hands. The Martyr's Endurance on Footfall is rumoured to be her favourite haunt.
